question: Imagine you are at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and you have been assigned a task by Professor McGonagall. Your task is to visit a series of magical artifacts. question: Professor Sprout has an enchanted garden with various magical plants, each planted by characters from the Harry Potter series. function: Post-order traversal to count leaf nodes
